name: Expecting
description:
Life is a beautiful process... from birth to death

But there is a fear so overwhelming that it casts a grotesque shadow over the allure of it.

At this point is it worth even trying...

FULLSCREEN - trust me

Note - 

Being new to  Bitsy, I had trouble figuring out music and sound effects. That is why there is an award looping soundtrack. Some tips, pointers, and tricks would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks for checking out my game
